title: MPR announced for local white and red rice
body_lines: A Gazette Extraordinary has been issued stipulating a maximum retail price (MRP) for local white/red rice, effective from yesterday (June 10).
It was published by the Chairman of Consumer Affairs Authority (CAA) Shantha Dissanayake.
As per the communiqué, the new MRP on white/red rice now sits at Rs. 210.00.
